Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class CommandParsing

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CommandParsing
public class CommandParsing extends Object
CommandParsing class is used to parse the user's input

  • Constructor Details

    • CommandParsing

      public CommandParsing(ClientController master)
      constructor CommandParsing to set the ClientController and set the parameters.
      Parameters:
      master - - the clientController, used to invoke its methods

  • Method Details

    • elaborateInput

      public void elaborateInput(String command)
      elaborateInput method first checks whether the command could be a username or a number of players (to create a waiting room). If neither is the case, it parses the user's input by separating the words and saving them in a list of strings, and it saves the first argument into the command parameter.
      Parameters:
      command - - the input of the client from the view.

    • setPlaying

      public void setPlaying(int playing)
      setPlaying method is used to set the attribute isPlaying to true when it's the user's turn
      Parameters:
      playing - - when this int is >0, the user is either choosing the tiles, the column or re-arranging their tiles; when it's 0, it is not the user's turn

    • setGameIsOn

      public void setGameIsOn(boolean gameIsOn)
      setGameIsOn is used to set the attribute gameIsOn when the game has started
      Parameters:
      gameIsOn - - boolean signalling whether the game has started or not

    • checkTilesFormat

      public boolean checkTilesFormat(String s)
      method checkTilesFormat checks whether the format is correct. If so, it returns true
      Parameters:
      s - - user's input
      Returns:
      true if the format is correct, otherwise it returns false

    • setFirst

      public void setFirst(boolean b)
      setFirst method signals whether the user is the first one connecting, and therefore has to create a waiting room
      Parameters:
      b - - boolean signalling whether the user needs to create a waiting room or not
